channel.title: public speaking on Aiman Ismail
channel.description: Recent content in public speaking on Aiman Ismail

item.title: On Public Speaking
item.description: I had the chance to give a talk at my local DevOps meetup last July and recently, I gave another talk at a Tech Talk event hosted by my current employer. Both talks are related to OPA but this blog post will be more of a personal reflection for me just to document these moments in my career. There are two common things that I noticed about myself from giving the talk and I’m gonna describe them here.
